txt.en: 'Dale is in ruins.'
'My brother knows not how to rule.'
'Those who attacked the town did us a favour.'
'Akshir served his purpose.'
'I see a different future, if I were King.'
'As did you, [placeholder].'
Instance: The Weeping Warrior
'One which sees a partnership between the Dale-lands and the East.'
'You came north, as I knew you would.'
'Dale could become the most powerful empire in the North!'
'You followed the course I set.'
'My friend agrees with me.'
'Aaaaaghh!'
'Smaug, Scatha, Fingar, Hrímil, Thostír.'
'I have learned much about being a ruler.'
'I have learned much of the east, and of Rhûn.'
'There are great powers in Rhûn.'
'Now we are close to my friend.'
'He will explain these truths to you.'
'Do not worry, Akshir, [placeholder] was only misguided.'
'Bryn! Why have you brought this [placeholder] here?'
'Akshir, explain to [placeholder], your ideas of uniting Dale and Rhûn.'
'This [placeholder] only just tried to kill me!'
'Akshir, is there not another way?'
'Hmm, well... keep your distance, [placeholder], and I will hold my quarrel with you.'
'I, I need more time.'
'There is no time for that now.'
'We must complete your training.'
'What is going on? [placeholder]!'
'Take this blade.'
'Take it! You know what you must do!'
'After all I have taught you, and you ask this of me?'
'There is no more time!'
'It is peaceful out here in the wilds.'
'This is the only place where I can clearly think.'
